Used by researchers, students, and life-long learners, ResearchPRO is your second brain. 

Create highlights on any web-page or pdf and sync them into Notion in real-time. Create categories or "buckets" to group related highlights on the fly (SHIFT SHIFT shortcut), and create and export bibliographies for related sources.

The easiest way to collect and categorize highlights on the web.
